channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Maven
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Maven

item.title: CVE-2022-29599|2024-08-03T06:26:06.558Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20maven
item.description: In Apache Maven maven-shared-utils prior to version 3.3.3, the Commandline class can emit double-quoted strings without proper escaping, allowing shell injection attacks.
